column3: Code change is correct.  This change needs a better change description though.  The one-line summary is "update src/wallet.cpp" which is not acceptable.  Use something like "correct LoadWallet() return value"\n
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/33d4e3ee9233de60f93a4f2d86c9398816f5c7e5 for binaries and test log.\n
